biotools.summary: Framework built for the prioritization of disease candidate genes using a priori gene-disease associations and protein interactions. It consists of implementations of 8 algorithms: NetScore, NetZcore, NetShort, NetCombo, fFlow, NetRank, NetWalk and NetProp.

bioschemas.name: GUILD
bioschemas.summary: Framework built for the prioritization of disease candidate genes using a priori gene-disease associations and protein interactions. It consists of implementations of 8 algorithms: NetScore, NetZcore, NetShort, NetCombo, fFlow, NetRank, NetWalk and NetProp.
